_meta.description: Comprehensive talent ability definitions for SWSE Foundry system

block.name: Block
block.description: Make a Use the Force check to negate a melee attack. If your check equals or exceeds the attack roll, the attack deals no damage.
block.trigger: When hit by a melee attack

deflect.name: Deflect
deflect.description: Make a Use the Force check to negate a ranged attack. If your check equals or exceeds the attack roll, the attack deals no damage.
deflect.trigger: When hit by a ranged attack

redirect-shot.name: Redirect Shot
redirect-shot.description: When you successfully deflect a ranged attack, you may redirect the attack at any target within 6 squares. Make a Use the Force check; if it equals or exceeds the new target's Reflex Defense, the attack hits. Alternatively, spend a Force Point to automatically hit.

alternativeAction.name: Auto-Hit Redirect
alternativeAction.effect: Automatically redirect and hit any target within 6 squares

adept-negotiator.name: Adept Negotiator
adept-negotiator.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check against the target's Will Defense. If successful, move the target -1 step on the condition track. You gain +5 bonus if opponent is higher level. If at bottom of track, target cannot attack unless attacked first.

master-negotiator.name: Master Negotiator
master-negotiator.description: As Adept Negotiator, but the target moves -2 steps on the condition track instead of -1.

skilled-advisor.name: Skilled Advisor
skilled-advisor.description: As a full-round action, grant one ally within line of sight +5 bonus on their next skill check. If you spend a Force Point, the bonus increases to +10.

force-persuasion.name: Force Persuasion
force-persuasion.description: You may use your Use the Force skill modifier instead of your Persuasion skill modifier when making Persuasion checks.

force-focus.name: Force Focus
force-focus.description: Add one-half your character level (rounded down) to Use the Force checks. Once per encounter, you may regain one spent Force power as a swift action. You may also spend a Force Point as a swift action to regain a spent Force power.

alternativeAction.name: Regain via Force Point
alternativeAction.effect: Spend a Force Point to regain one spent Force power (no limit)

inspire-confidence.name: Inspire Confidence
inspire-confidence.description: As a standard action, grant all allies within line of sight a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls and skill checks for the encounter. Alternatively, as a swift action, allow one unconscious ally to immediately regain consciousness with 1 HP.

alternativeAction.effect: One unconscious ally within line of sight regains consciousness with 1 HP

bolster-ally.name: Bolster Ally
bolster-ally.description: As a standard action, move one ally within line of sight +1 step on the condition track.

ignite-fervor.name: Ignite Fervor
ignite-fervor.description: When you hit with an attack, as a swift action, you may grant one ally within line of sight a bonus to their next damage roll equal to their level.
ignite-fervor.trigger: After you hit with an attack

willpower.name: Willpower
willpower.description: Once per encounter, as a swift action, grant all allies within line of sight a +2 morale bonus to Will Defense for the rest of the encounter.

beloved.name: Beloved
beloved.description: Choose one effect: (1) Swift action - grant one ally +2 Reflex Defense until your next turn; (2) Immediate action - grant one ally a free attack; (3) Reaction - allow all allies within 6 squares to move up to their speed.

choices.name: Defensive Aid
choices.effect: Grant one ally +2 Reflex Defense until your next turn

choices.name: Offensive Aid
choices.effect: Grant one ally a free attack

choices.name: Tactical Retreat
choices.effect: All allies within 6 squares may move up to their speed

sneak-attack.name: Sneak Attack
sneak-attack.description: Once per round, when you hit a target denied its Dexterity bonus to Reflex Defense, deal +1d6 extra damage. Additional Sneak Attack talents increase this by +1d6 each.
sneak-attack.trigger: Target is denied Dex bonus to Reflex Defense

skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
skirmisher.description: Deal +1d6 extra damage when you hit a target you did not attack on your previous turn.
skirmisher.trigger: Hit a target you didn't attack last turn

dastardly-strike.name: Dastardly Strike
dastardly-strike.description: When you deal damage to an opponent denied their Dex bonus to Reflex Defense, move them -1 step on the condition track.
dastardly-strike.trigger: Deal damage to target denied Dex bonus

devastating-attack.name: Devastating Attack
devastating-attack.description: Once per encounter, when you hit with a melee attack using a weapon in which you have Weapon Focus, deal +1 die of damage.

weapon-specialization.name: Weapon Specialization
weapon-specialization.description: Deal +2 damage with weapons of a selected weapon group.

greater-weapon-specialization.name: Greater Weapon Specialization
greater-weapon-specialization.description: Deal +2 additional damage (total +4) with weapons of a selected weapon group. Requires Weapon Specialization in same group.

uncanny-dodge-1.name: Uncanny Dodge I
uncanny-dodge-1.description: You retain your Dexterity bonus to Reflex Defense even when flat-footed.

uncanny-dodge-2.name: Uncanny Dodge II
uncanny-dodge-2.description: You cannot be flanked. Sneak attacks against you only work if the attacker is 4+ levels higher.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: If an attack against your Reflex Defense deals half damage on a miss, you take no damage on a miss instead.

improved-evasion.name: Improved Evasion
improved-evasion.description: If an attack against your Reflex Defense deals half damage on a miss, you take half damage on a hit instead of full damage.

hide-in-plain-sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
hide-in-plain-sight.description: You can make Stealth checks to hide even while being observed, without needing cover or concealment.

improved-stealth.name: Improved Stealth
improved-stealth.description: You can move at full speed while using Stealth without taking a penalty.

total-concealment.name: Total Concealment
total-concealment.description: When hidden, you gain total concealment (+5 to Stealth checks and attackers have 50% miss chance).

hunters-mark.name: Hunter's Mark
hunters-mark.description: When you aim and then hit with your next attack, move the target -1 step on the condition track in addition to normal damage.

familiar-foe.name: Familiar Foe
familiar-foe.description: Gain +1 insight bonus to attack rolls against a designated target until the end of the encounter. You can designate a new target as a swift action.

hunters-target.name: Hunter's Target
hunters-target.description: Gain +2 insight bonus to damage rolls against your designated Familiar Foe target.

acute-senses.name: Acute Senses
acute-senses.description: You can reroll any Perception check, but you must keep the second result even if it's worse.

keen-shot.name: Keen Shot
keen-shot.description: Gain +1 insight bonus to ranged attack rolls against targets within 6 squares.

armored-defense.name: Armored Defense
armored-defense.description: When wearing armor, gain +1 bonus to Reflex Defense. This stacks with the armor's bonus.

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: While wearing heavy armor, reduce damage from non-area attacks by an amount equal to your armor's equipment bonus to Reflex Defense.

second-skin.name: Second Skin
second-skin.description: Increase your armor's maximum Dexterity bonus by +1.

melee-smash.name: Melee Smash
melee-smash.description: When making a melee attack with a one-handed weapon or unarmed strike, add one-half your heroic level to damage.

stunning-strike.name: Stunning Strike
stunning-strike.description: When you deal damage with a melee attack that exceeds the target's damage threshold, move target -1 step on condition track.
stunning-strike.trigger: Melee damage exceeds target's damage threshold

unbalancing-attack.name: Unbalancing Attack
unbalancing-attack.description: After hitting with a melee attack, you may attempt to knock the target prone as a free action.
unbalancing-attack.trigger: After hitting with a melee attack

draw-fire.name: Draw Fire
draw-fire.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check vs target's Will Defense. If successful, target must attack you if able, and cannot attack allies within 6 squares of you unless you have cover.

keep-them-at-bay.name: Keep Them at Bay
keep-them-at-bay.description: When you aid another to suppress an attack, increase the suppression penalty from -2 to -5.

cover-fire.name: Cover Fire
cover-fire.description: When you make a ranged attack, allies within 6 squares gain +1 to all Defenses until your next turn.
cover-fire.trigger: When you make a ranged attack

battle-analysis.name: Battle Analysis
battle-analysis.description: As a swift action, make a Knowledge (tactics) check DC 15. Success grants allies within 6 squares +1 insight bonus to attack rolls for the round.

trigger-work.name: Trigger Work
trigger-work.description: Negate the -2 penalty from Rapid Shot feat when making ranged attacks.

debilitating-shot.name: Debilitating Shot
debilitating-shot.description: When you aim and hit with a ranged attack, move the target -1 step on the condition track.

knockdown-shot.name: Knockdown Shot
knockdown-shot.description: When you aim and hit with a ranged attack, knock the target prone if they are no more than two size categories larger.

multiattack-proficiency.name: Multiattack Proficiency
multiattack-proficiency.description: Reduce the penalty for making multiple attacks by 2 with a specific weapon group.

controlled-burst.name: Controlled Burst
controlled-burst.description: Reduce autofire or burst-fire penalty by 2. If braced, no penalty.

force-warning.name: Force Warning
force-warning.description: You cannot be surprised. You always act during a surprise round, even if you would not normally be aware of your opponents.

gauge-force-potential.name: Gauge Force Potential
gauge-force-potential.description: As a standard action, make a Use the Force check to determine a creature's Force Sensitivity, heroic level, and dark side score.

force-treatment.name: Force Treatment
force-treatment.description: As a standard action, make a Use the Force check instead of a Treat Injury check to treat an injured creature.

temporal-awareness.name: Temporal Awareness
temporal-awareness.description: Once per encounter, when attacked, you may move up to your speed as an immediate reaction before the attack is resolved.

rapid-reaction.name: Rapid Reaction
rapid-reaction.description: You can take one additional swift action per round.

electronic-sabotage.name: Electronic Sabotage
electronic-sabotage.description: As a standard action, use Computer to sabotage electronics. Success causes penalties or disables the target system.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: When you access a computer system, make a Use Computer check to trace any remote users.

vehicular-evasion.name: Vehicular Evasion
vehicular-evasion.description: When piloting a vehicle, if an attack against the vehicle's Reflex Defense would deal half damage on miss, it deals no damage instead.

full-throttle.name: Full Throttle
full-throttle.description: When piloting, you may increase vehicle speed by 1 square per round as a free action.

juke.name: Juke
juke.description: Once per encounter, as a reaction when your vehicle is attacked, add your heroic level to vehicle's Reflex Defense.

starship-tactics.name: Starship Tactics
starship-tactics.description: As a swift action, grant all gunners on your starship +2 to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

elusive-target.name: Elusive Target
elusive-target.description: When fighting defensively or using total defense, gain an additional +2 to Reflex Defense.

fringe-savant.name: Fringe Savant
fringe-savant.description: Choose one trained skill. You gain +5 competence bonus on checks with that skill.

long-stride.name: Long Stride
long-stride.description: Increase your base speed by 2 squares.

barter.name: Barter
barter.description: When buying goods or services, reduce the cost by 10% by succeeding on a Persuasion check.

weaken-resolve.name: Weaken Resolve
weaken-resolve.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense. Success imposes -2 to all defenses until end of your next turn.

presence.name: Presence
presence.description: You can use Persuasion instead of Deception to feint in combat.

demand-surrender.name: Demand Surrender
demand-surrender.description: Once per encounter, as a standard action, make Persuasion vs Will. If target is below half HP and you succeed by 5+, target surrenders.

lucky-shot.name: Lucky Shot
lucky-shot.description: Once per day, reroll one attack roll and take the better result.

fortunes-favor.name: Fortune's Favor
fortunes-favor.description: Once per day, add +1d6 to any d20 roll after seeing the result.

knack.name: Knack
knack.description: Once per day, treat a skill check as if you rolled a natural 20.

droidcraft.name: Droidcraft
droidcraft.description: You can create droids in half the normal time. Gain +5 to Mechanics checks to repair or modify droids.

master-slicer.name: Master Slicer
master-slicer.description: Gain +5 competence bonus to Use Computer checks.

lightsaber-defense.name: Lightsaber Defense
lightsaber-defense.description: While wielding a lightsaber, gain +1 deflection bonus to Reflex Defense.

lightsaber-throw.name: Lightsaber Throw
lightsaber-throw.description: As a standard action, make a ranged attack with your lightsaber against a target within 6 squares. The lightsaber returns to your hand.

severing-strike.name: Severing Strike
severing-strike.description: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to sever one of the target's limbs (your choice). The target loses the limb and takes a persistent -5 penalty to related checks.

dark-side-sense.name: Dark Side Sense
dark-side-sense.description: As a standard action, make a Use the Force check to sense the presence of the dark side within 100 meters per level.

force-intuition.name: Force Intuition
force-intuition.description: You may use your Use the Force skill modifier instead of Initiative when making Initiative checks.

ataru.name: Ataru
ataru.description: When making acrobatic maneuvers, gain +2 to attack rolls but -2 to Reflex Defense until your next turn.

djem-so.name: Djem So
djem-so.description: When you successfully block or deflect an attack, you may make an immediate counterattack against the attacker.
djem-so.trigger: After successfully using Block or Deflect

makashi.name: Makashi
makashi.description: When wielding a lightsaber in one hand with nothing in the other, gain +2 to attack rolls against targets wielding melee weapons.
makashi.condition: Lightsaber in one hand, other hand empty

niman.name: Niman
niman.description: When you use a Force power as a standard action, you may make a single lightsaber attack as a swift action.
niman.trigger: After using a Force power as standard action

shien.name: Shien
shien.description: When you successfully deflect a ranged attack, you may spend a Force Point to automatically redirect it back at the attacker.

shii-cho.name: Shii-Cho
shii-cho.description: When wielding a lightsaber and fighting multiple opponents, gain +1 to attack and damage for each opponent beyond the first adjacent to you.

soresu.name: Soresu
soresu.description: While wielding a lightsaber, once per round you may Block or Deflect without using your reaction.

juyo.name: Juyo
juyo.description: When making a full attack with a lightsaber, gain +2 to damage rolls but -2 to all defenses until your next turn.

vaapad.name: Vaapad
vaapad.description: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, move the target -1 step on the condition track in addition to extra damage.

acrobatic-recovery.name: Acrobatic Recovery
acrobatic-recovery.description: When knocked prone, you may spend a Force Point to immediately stand up as a free action.

force-haze.name: Force Haze
force-haze.description: Spend a Force Point as a standard action to create a distortion in the Force. All creatures within 6 squares must succeed on a Will save (DC 15 + your Cha modifier) or be dazed for 1 round.

improved-dark-rage.name: Improved Dark Rage
improved-dark-rage.description: When using Dark Rage, you may spend a Force Point to gain an additional +2 bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and Fortitude Defense for the duration.

surge-of-power.name: Surge of Power
surge-of-power.description: Spend a Force Point as a swift action to add your heroic level to the damage dealt by your next Force power used this turn.

force-point-recovery.name: Force Point Recovery
force-point-recovery.description: Once per day, when you spend a Force Point, you may immediately regain 1 Force Point. You may spend a second Force Point to regain 2 Force Points instead.
